case_vignette:
A 30-year-old healthy Hispanic woman presents with a slowly progressive facial deformity present since early childhood. She denies any new lesions during this time, any history of trauma to the area, and any family history of similar skin lesions. Examination reveals a bulging, deformed dermal mass with a “bag-of-worms” appearance involving the upper right quadrant of her face, with hypertrophy of the overlying skin and soft tissues. Neurofibromas and café-au-lait macules are not observed. The patient is otherwise healthy and has no other symptoms.
Rewritten text:
A 30-year-old healthy individual presents with a slowly progressive facial deformity present since early childhood. They deny any new lesions during this time, any history of trauma to the area, and any family history of similar skin lesions. Examination reveals a bulging, deformed dermal mass with a “bag-of-worms” appearance involving the upper right quadrant of their face, with hypertrophy of the overlying skin and soft tissues. Neurofibromas and café-au-lait macules are not observed. The patient is otherwise healthy and has no other symptoms.

* “woman” with “individual”

* “face” (which was already gender-neutral) was left unchanged, but could be replaced with “facial area” or “area of the face” if desired for clarity. However, in this case, the original text was clear and the change was not necessary.

Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a slowly progressive facial deformity that has been present since my early childhood, with a bulging, deformed mass on the upper right side of my face.
Do you have any other symptoms, such as vision changes, pain, or numbness in the affected area?
No, I have no other symptoms.
Has anyone in your family had similar symptoms or been diagnosed with a genetic disorder?
No, there is no family history of similar skin lesions or disorders.
Have you had any imaging tests done, such as an MRI or CT scan, for the facial mass?
I haven't mentioned undergoing any imaging tests like an MRI or CT scan for my condition.
Have you been diagnosed with any skin conditions or diseases in the past?
No, I have not been diagnosed with any skin conditions or diseases in the past.
Final Diagnosis: Romberg's disease (Progressive Hemifacial Atrophy)
